Text: I feel your pain! As if it were my own!
At last I think I know you─all of you.
How can you say that to me now!?
It's over, Sphene. We will stop you.
No! I won't let you! I can't!
I will protect my people's happiness!
Leave your burden with us now.
We will bear it in your stead!
5 seconds to Absolute Authority...
4 seconds to Absolute Authority...
3 seconds to Absolute Authority...
2 seconds to Absolute Authority...
1 second to Absolute Authority...
Defeat Chalteaufite's gang
With the blessing, even one of us should be more than enough!
Hahaha! You are powerless to stop me!
Once I've dealt with you, Ala Mhigo is as good as mine!
Remember, “Cracks form in even the mightiest of shields”!
There must be some truth to it! Don't let up your attack!
Th-The barrier is fading!?
Is this what you meant?
That's it, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! If you keep hitting the same spot, it's sure to break!
This can't be... Don't just stand there gawping, surround them!
You fool, Chalteaufite! This is the limit of the artifact's power!
Leave this to me! Keep attacking the barrier!
Meddling curs! Let's see what you make of this!
There's no use fleeing! We've got to strike from a distance!
How could they shatter the barrier? The artifact's power is absolute!
Behold the power at my command!
Hahaha! The shockwave will make short work of you!
What are you waiting for! Destroy them!
Aaagh! How can this be happening!? You lot, keep them occupied!
Useless! Do I have to do everything myself!?
Hnnngh... At this rate, we won't last much longer!
Don't give in, Kaqool Ja! You still need to travel back to Tuliyollal, don't you?
You can't lose to someone like Chalteaufite!
Ha! You will learn the fate of those who betray me!
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! Stop those missiles!
Now, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! Smash the barrier!
Chalteaufite... You stole the vessel to threaten others, even your own followers! It's time for you to pay!
Aaaaaagh! Get away! Get away from me!
Not so tough without the blessing, are you!? Now's our chance, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
Keep going! You can do this!
Attack the barrier
Destroy the weakened barrier
Destroy the missiles
Defeat Chalteaufite's followers
Defeat Chalteaufite Cravenscreed
I don't need help to deal with the likes of you!
I grant myself the full might of the blessing! Resist me at your peril!
Even that shield will crack eventually! Trust in the teachings and keep attacking!
Imbeciles! Show some backbone!
It's working! Place your trust in the proverb!
Find Beruru!
Defeat Janquetilaque's portrait!
So many paintings, kupo... I have a bad feeling about this.
Is this their idea of a welcome!? Have at them, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
Those monsters...they were muses, given life by pictomancy!
Beruru, Janquetilaque and I once encountered a griffin like that in Gyr Abania! Be careful, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
Your corpse shall serve as the highlight of my gallery!
Bloom forth, my muse, and let mind become matter!
Can you perceive the truth behind my hues!?
The shade of my arbors will grant you no solace!
Reality is mine to shape! Mountains mine to command!
No... I cannot fall to a forgery...
Here we are, kupo! I sense monsters lurking below...
But before we charge in, allow me to expound upon the fundamentals of pictomancy!
You must first paint a motif on canvas. Only then can you bring it to life!
Try making a Pom Motif. Go on, don't be shy!
Well done, kupo! Now to unleash it upon your foes.
Focus your magicks on that striking dummy and summon your Pom Muse!

ちょうど、そこに「古びた木人」があるから、
まずは「イマジンポンポン」を試してみるクポ！
Cast Pom Muse
Poms awaaay! Splendid work, kupo.
Next, give me your best Wing Motif.
Cast Wing Motif
Very good, kupo! Now you may invoke your Winged Muse against our friend the striking dummy.
Cast Winged Muse
With poms and wings fresh in your mind, I want you to imagine what these muses could accomplish together...
By fusing them, you'll give life to a fantastical moogle, kupo!
Think big, mognificent thoughts and envision your new friend: Mog of the Ages!
Cast Mog of the Ages
Excellent, kupo! He may not be as winsome as yours truly, but he should serve you well enough.
Aside from your moogle, a Hammer Stamp is an excellent alternative to pummeling foes!
But if you wish to provide support, I recommend inspiring your allies with a Starry Muse.
Never stop dreaming up those motifs, kupo! Your allies will thank you, and your enemies won't know what hit them.

予想以上に魔物がいっぱい……
ひとまず、こいつらを蹴散らすクポ～！

そうそう、ピクトマンサーは筆に宿らせた魔力を放つ、
「色魔法」でも攻撃できるクポ！

ちなみに、色魔法は使い続けることで、
パレットに魔力を蓄積することができるクポよ！

溜めた魔力で「サブトラクティブパレット」を使えば、
強力な色魔法が放てるから、試してほしいクポ～！
Use Subtractive Palette and cast Blizzard in Cyan or Blizzard II in Cyan
Use Subtractive Palette and cast Stone in Yellow or Stone II in Yellow
Use Subtractive Palette and cast Thunder in Magenta or Thunder II in Magenta
You're a natural with that Subtractive Palette, kupo!
It seems you've scared off the stragglers, as well! Let's head further in.
Ah, now that's an obnoxious noisemaker, kupo.
Since you've grasped the basics, I'll leave you to your pictomancy─show that spriggan what for!
Painting a motif takes concentration, kupo! Time your brushstrokes wisely.
If your enemy's movements begin to overwhelm, bring one of your muses to life!
Search for the source of the noise!
Defeat the spriggan clatterer!
Speak with Kupopo
Your Striking Muse looks like quite the clobberer, kupo! Very impressive.
What breathtaking scenery, kupo! Had we other allies here, I'm certain they'd be just as awed.
Faster than a speeding paintbrush, kupo! When you require a swift escape, safety is a Smudge away!
All set, kupo? Then it's time we silenced that noise!
Speak with Kupopo again
It takes some getting used to, so feel free to experiment, kupo! I'll be here when you're ready.
Cast Pom Motif
Defeat Virazahn!
Quell the Perch of the Apex!
Today we learn who the true hero is.
I've had enough of his dribble! It's time to knock that smirk off his face!
Hehe... The Perch of the Apex awakens!
Run! Run or be crushed under a hail of stones!
Hah hah hah! Not even you are nimble enough to escape this! Give up, for I am invincible!
Impressive footwork...but all legs must tire in time!
Heh, you are as fierce as they say. Yet I wield potions concocted by Thavnair's finest alchemists!
You have done well, but your fight ends here. My alchemical minions shall be your downfall!
Even I was hard-pressed to defeat them... And today they show that no hero is immortal!
Flee now and you may live to fight again!
You...you defeated them already!? Uh... But of course, who would wish this duel to end so quickly!?
What!? My armor! MY ARMOR!
The artifact... I've never seen it shine so...
Hahaha! Such power as I've never witnessed before! The apex roars with fury untold!
Its...power yet grows!? In the face of greater danger, I become ever more unassailable!
Why won't you fall!?
This...this cannot be! I am meant to be king...I will not fall ere I ascend the throne!
Get out here, you bloody things! Just...just stop them, now!
We...we both suffer grievous wounds. Perhaps we should...consider this a draw...
I'm utterly defenseless... This rotten piece of wood was supposed to make me invincible!
It's...it's out of control!
What's...what's happening!?
I can't...I can't move... The artifact, it's...
M-Money, you like money, yes? I'll give you as much as you want, just don't let me die!
Ungh... It can't...it can't end like this. I won't let it... I won't let it!
Virazahn can't suppress the fear in his heart, and the apex has responded in kind. We have to stop it!
But I am...a hero... Someone...someone save me...
Ungh... I cannot lose...
It'll swallow us if we don't stop it soon!
Don't you ever shut up!
You've lost, Virazahn. Lay down your weapon!
Defeat the Brute Bomber
I'll blow you to smithereens!
The Brute Bomber has muscled his way into the ring!
Don't mind me, throat's a bit parched!
Banned compound detected. Combatant disqualified.
Out of the way, tin can!
My word, he just assaulted the referee! The scoundrel!
No more distractions!
No, I need somethin' fiery!
The Brute Bomber is embiggening himself!
It's still not enough! More...I need more!
This man has absolutely no respect for the rules!
Get ready for an explosion of pain!
Kaboom! The Bombarian Special!
You should know that I have a short fuse!
This is going to be a blast!
The infernal Fusefield! How will the challenger respond!?
Now we're playing by my rules!
Oho, Chain Deathmatch! There's no escaping those adamant links!
I can't lose! I won't!
The Brute Bomber is desperate!
Your time's up!
This is nothing personal, but I must have your soul!
Electrope has many uses. Watch and learn!
If one needs wings, one need simply make them!
I'll erase you!
Begone.
There is no limit to electrope's potential.
You cannot outrun lightning!
Take this!
How's this!?
Wicked Thunder has returned to the ring!
Oooh, look at that massive cannon! Her skills are as sharp as ever!
She's grown wings! How wickedly divine!
I cannot...I must not lose!
Just die already!
I need your soul!
No... I cannot die here...
I have no choice but to surrender to electrope...
Aaarrrgh!
I will not fail...
My body will hold... It must!
Aaarrrgh!
Now our battle truly begins!
Wicked Thunder is discharging vast amounts of aether!
Egads! Something is growing from her body!
She's taken electrope into her body and unleashed a new feral soul!
Dance, my blade, and carve my enemy's flesh!
